name: Cosmic Combat
description:
Description:
Cosmic Combat, a Shoot 'em Up with many effects, particles and explosions.
Start a new game within seconds and reach the top of the online highscores.

Fight against a huge amount of different enemys and bosses. Collect upgrades for your weapons and your ship. Play the game for free and try to be the best. There is no end in this game. No score limit. And endless amount of levels. Some are randomly generated, some are always the same. But it's always a new adventure and always a whole lot of fun!

Features:
- Online Highscore!
- No Installation, just download and play!
- Many different enemys!
- Tons of Upgrades!
- Many effects and particles
- Special Upgrades like shielddrones or laserdrones!
- Permadeath
- Fitting Music and powerful sounds
